Home.title: NextJS i18n Tutorial
Home.description: Tutorial of how to manipulate i18n based on route path or domain with  Nextjs v15

card.w12: IS A COMPOUND WORD (E.G. SKYLINE, UNDERGROUND)
card.w13: FIRST LETTER IS REPEATED WITHIN THE WORD (E.G. RURAL, EERIE)
card.w14: HAS 3 OR MORE CONSECUTIVE CONSONANTS (E.G. FIGHT, PEBBLE)
card.w15: HAS 1 OR MORE REPEATED LETTERS (E.G. KEEP, TOTAL)
card.w18: HAS 2 OR MORE CONSECUTIVE VOWELS (NOT INCLUDING "Y") (E.G. EE, OU, AI)
card.w24: FIRST 2 LETTERS ARE IN ALPHABETICAL ORDER
card.c1: MOST PEOPLE HAVE IT AT HOME
card.c3: YOU EXPECT TO FIND IT IN AN OFFICE
card.c4: YOU EXPECT TO FIND IT AT A SCHOOL
card.c9: YOU CAN FIND IT WITHIN AN HOUR FROM HERE
card.c10: CAN BE BOUGHT IN A STORE
card.c16: USUALLY ONLY OWNED BY RICH PEOPLE
card.c20: CAN BE FOUND IN THIS BUILDING
card.c22: COULD HELP YOU SURVIVE IN THE WILDERNESS
card.c24: PASSENGERS CAN CARRY IT ON AN AIRPLANE
card.a14: WOULD HURT IF DROPPED ON YOU
card.a20: COULD BE HELD WITH ONE HAND

Generator.description: Generate a random word from the list
